mapper.sql: RECORD_FLOW, GRADUATION_YEAR, ORG_NAME, ORG_FLOW, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.JSRES_GRADUATION_ATTACHMENT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.JSRES_GRADUATION_ATTACHMENT (RECORD_FLOW, GRADUATION_YEAR, ORG_NAME, ORG_FLOW, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduationYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
